subject: Plus X Pedals Suddenly Not working properly
description_text:
Hello,

I am reaching out regarding an issue I am experiencing with my Plus X pedals. They were functioning correctly until recently when I began noticing a lag issue. Specifically, during both calibration and regular use, the throttle and brake inputs appear to freeze briefly in the software’s calibration curve box before continuing. This makes it difficult to achieve smooth and accurate pedal response.

To troubleshoot, I have already rewired the control box to avoid any EMI issue, but unfortunately, the issue persists. I would appreciate any guidance you can provide to help resolve this problem. Could you please advise on the next steps for further troubleshooting?

Thank you for your assistance.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Ahmad Bahlawan, Please make sure the USB cable is connected directly to the rear USB 3.0 blue port on your PC and not through a USB hub, to ensure stable power. Also, please download the latest Simsonn Manager 2.1.2 software and update the firmware.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hello,

Could you please clarify what you mean by the “blue USB port”? I do not see any colored ports on the back panel of my PC; it appears to be a standard USB port.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,    May I ask which brand of docking station you are using? Also, if you don’t have a blue USB 3.0 port, you could try switching to another USB 2.0 port to see if that works.

Hello,


ASUS Rog z390-e gaming, it is not a new PC though




Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,     Please take a photo of the motherboard ports at the back of the PC and show me.

By the way now I saw the blue USB ports, are those the USB 3.0?



Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,  The blue one is USB 3.0. Please plug it in and test if there are still any issues.

Okay, thanks, will test it out

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Unfortunately, it is still doing the same… The curves freezes for a second and then the motion continues and inside the  game the pedals aren’t working by the way i only bought this pedals from your official store last month

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,     Have you updated the firmware version yet?  Please take a photo of the pedal and the main controller so I can check whether the green wire is connected.  Also, could you let me know the model of your base?         Hi Ahmad Bahlawan, Please make sure the USB cable is connected directly to the rear USB 3.0 blue port on your PC and not through a USB hub, to ensure stable power. Also, please download the latest Simsonn Manager 2.1.2software and update the firmware.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hi, Yes i did update everything, my wheelbase is Thrustmaster T818, by the way, day before yesterday everything was working super find

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,    I noticed that you’re also using the VAM Pro printed mount — it looks great.  Please turn off the base power and disconnect the VAM Pro power supply, then check whether the stuttering issue still occurs.  If the problem persists, we’ll send you a replacement main controller.  If the issue disappears, it’s likely that the base is interfering with the pedal, or that the base or the computer is not properly grounded through a three-prong outlet.  In that case, changes in the setup environment may have affected the pedal signal stability.

I did all what you mentioned and still the issue persists unfortunately…

When you mention base, do you mean Wheelbase? Or Pedals stand base?

What is the problem?

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,    Please turn off the Thrustmaster T818 base, then reconnect the pedals and test whether the stuttering issue still occurs when pressing them.

Yes, I did that, and it is still doing the same, and the issue persists unfortunately

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

So, what is the issue now? Is the control box got faulty?

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,     Please provide your order number, contact person, phone number, and address. I will send you a replacement main controller and a USB data cable tomorrow.  However, this is the first time I’ve encountered such an issue. In theory, the pedals should not stutter unless your computer is running slowly.  In addition, you can download the VKB JoyTester tool, which allows you to monitor the pedal’s input curves in real time. If the pedals are genuinely stuttering, you’ll immediately see breaks in the curve.  If Simsonn Manager shows stuttering but VKB JoyTester does not, it is likely due to low computer specifications affecting the software performance.     https://www.vkbcontrollers.com/pages/downloads

This is the order # SSN2732

The VAM pro adapter was received without the power cable!

Below are my address details:


Ahmad Bahlawan

Ashuaytha steet, Riyadh

Villa 7880 1/B

King Fahad 12274

Saudi Arabia

+966569460672

________________________________
Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,    Since you are in Saudi Arabia, could you let us know which type of power plug you require?  Also, how is the power currently connected on your side?

I don't think the PC specs are low..  attached are their specs

Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,    Alright, please let me know the amount you spent, and I will reimburse you via PayPal tomorrow; alternatively, we can send you a replacement power cable with a UK plug.

No need mate to reimburse me, just send a new cable from your store better, I wish the issue resolves when you send for me a new controller and please I need as fast as possible please

Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,    You can first use the VKB tool to check the pedal curves.  This will help prevent any delay in case the issue is not related to the pedals or the main controller when the replacement arrives.

Hi, I will check later as now I switched the PC off and left the house.

Thanks.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

Hello again, please I have a question, does the Pro X Ultra control box works with the Plus X pedals?

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Ahmad Bahlawan,  The ProX Ultra and PlusX are not interchangeable, as their sensor interfaces are completely different.

Hello,

Any update please about the new controller box shipment? Along with the VAM Pro adapter power cable?

We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2529301900104662

Thanks
